title: MT69008: Phase Transformation Lab. - Quick Facts

Credits | 2

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1.Experimental determination of a binary phase diagram2.Solidification macro/microstructure of some single phase and eutectic alloys3.Solidification Macrostructure of Cast Metals4.Microstructure of eutectic systems5.Study of the Solidification History in Welded Microstructure of Steels6.Study of pearlite transformation in eutectoid steel using DSC / DTA and determination of TTT diagram7.Cold rolling and recrystallisation annealing8.Study of crystallization of in an amorphous material9.Martensite transformation in Fe-Ni alloy to study the shape deformation
